Uses of Package
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache

Packages that use com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.bo The definition of business objects used inside the framework. 
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache Contains some caching features, based on RAM or/and the SD card (persistence) of the terminal. 
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.wscache Joins together the caching feature and the Web Services. 
 

Classes in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache used by com.smartnsoft.droid4me.bo
Persistence.PersistenceException
          The exception thrown when an error occurs during a persistence operation.
 

Classes in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache used by com.smartnsoft.droid4me.cache
Cacher
          A class which enables to cache business objects.
Cacher.Instructions
          Indicates whether the current cached data should be taken from the cache.
Cacher.Status
          Defines some common statuses.
Persistence
          Enables to store persistently on the internal/external device "hard-drive" some contents.
Persistence.PersistenceException
          The exception thrown when an error occurs during a persistence operation.
Persistence.UriUsage
          Defined in order to count how many times an URI has been consumed.
Persistence.UriUsages
          Used by the classes overriding the Persistence class, so as to keep track of how many time each persisted URI has been accessed.
Values.CacheableValue
          Defines a basic contract which enables to cache a business object in memory, know when it has been cached, and have a dynamic strategy for refreshing the object.
Values.CachedMap
          Enables to cache in memory a map of business objects.
Values.CachedValue
          Enables to cache a business object in memory only.
Values.CacheException
           
Values.Caching
          Defines a common class for all "cacheables", i.e.
Values.CachingEvent
          Used when requesting a Values.CacheableValue or a Values.CachedMap for retrieving a business object, depending on the current workflow.
Values.Info
          Gathers a business object and its time stamp.
Values.Instructions
          Used and required when the business object is not available in memory.
Values.Instructions.Result
          States the result of an assessment.
Values.MemoryInstructions
           
Values.WithParameterInstructions

Values.BackedCachedMap
